channel.title: Changing the starting point and items rep++ for help
channel.description: how do i change where a person starts at and what they start with?

item.title: Changing the starting point and items rep++ for help
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

open client.java , search for " sM(“You are IP muted.”); " , scroll down a little bit and you should see something like that :

addItem(1323, 1);
addItem(1191, 1);
addItem(562, 100);
addItem(841, 1);
addItem(882, 500);
addItem(995, 1000000);

You can add more items , or edit the current ones ( this is what player gets to his inv when he logs on for the first time )

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the starting point and items rep++ for help

item.title: Changing the starting point and items rep++ for help
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

OK, for delta, its in player.java
in player.java, find the coords of where u start when u first login, (do ::mypos when u login!)
then, search those coords in player.java, and edit them as u like.

For the equipment:
im not sure

Read full topic
